code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',description:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();console.log('Form Data Submitted:',formData);try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/data',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(formData)});const result=await response.json();console.log('Response from backend:',result);}catch(error){console.error('Error submitting data:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"JQuality Tool"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",name:"name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"description",children:"Description:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{id:"description",name:"description",value:formData.description,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]})]});}export default App;
